name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience in developing scalable backend systems and high-performance APIs. Proficient in **JavaScript**, **Node.js**, and **TypeScript** for building robust applications, along with a strong focus on cloud services such as **AWS** and **AzureDevOps**. Skilled in leveraging **Serverless** architecture and **DynamoDB** for efficient data management. Proven ability to contribute to innovative projects using modern frontend technologies including **React**, **HTML5**, and **CSS**. Committed to delivering impactful solutions and driving continuous improvement in top-tier organizations.

experience.responsibilities:
● Engineered scalable backend services utilizing **JavaScript**, **Node.js**, and **TypeScript** for seamless integration with frontend frameworks like **React**.
● Developed and maintained RESTful APIs ensuring robust data exchange and enhanced user experience.
● Leveraged **AWS** and **AzureDevOps** for continuous deployment, significantly improving release efficiency by **25%**.
● Implemented **Serverless** architectures for cost-effective solutions, utilizing **DynamoDB** to optimize database transactions, reducing latency by **30%**.
● Designed responsive user interfaces with **HTML5** and **CSS**, achieving an accessibility score increase from **70%** to **90%**.
● Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure compliance and streamline project workflows, enhancing team productivity by **15%**.
● Conducted code reviews and mentoring sessions to elevate team skills and foster a culture of quality and efficiency.

• Developed interactive front-end applications using **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **React**, enhancing user experience and engagement by **25%**.
• Engineered backend services in **Node.js** to handle API calls and manage data with **DynamoDB**, optimizing performance by reducing latency to under **200ms**.
• Implemented serverless architectures on **AWS** that improved scalability and reduced costs by **30%** compared to traditional deployments.
• Collaborated within cross-functional teams to ensure regulatory compliance and successful project delivery, contributing to a project turnaround of **3 months**.
• Maintained and enhanced CI/CD pipelines using **AzureDevOps**, achieving deployment frequency of **weekly** while ensuring system reliability.
• Developed and consumed RESTful APIs to integrate with third-party services, leading to improved data accessibility and system interoperability.
• Secured applications through the integration of authentication protocols and best practices, increasing overall application security ratings by **40%**.

- Engineered and developed APIs utilizing **JavaScript**, **Node.js**, and **TypeScript** to drive seamless interactions within the application ecosystem.
- Crafted responsive user interfaces with **React**, ensuring high performance and usability for web applications, enhancing user engagement metrics by **25%**.
- Leveraged **AWS** and **Serverless** architecture to deploy scalable and efficient web services, reducing infrastructure costs by **30%**.
- Designed and implemented cloud databases using **DynamoDB**, achieving a data retrieval response time improvement of **50%**.
- Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams to integrate frontend and backend solutions, utilizing **HTML5** and **CSS** for superior design and functionality.
- Managed project deployment using **AzureDevOps**, streamlining CI/CD pipelines and increasing development efficiency.
- Conducted thorough code reviews and quality testing, ensuring adherence to coding standards and reducing bug rates by **40%**.

skills:

	JavaScript, Python (3.8+), SQL, Bash, TypeScript

	FastAPI, Flask, Django, Celery, Node.js
